name: Standardization Workflow
description: Interactive flowchart showing the MicroSim standardization process for evaluating and upgrading quality scores.
author: Dan McCreary

bloom_taxonomy.name: Apply
bloom_taxonomy.description: Students will apply the standardization workflow to evaluate and upgrade MicroSim quality.

learning_objectives: Understand the complete standardization workflow for MicroSims
Identify decision points and their conditions in the workflow
Apply the workflow to evaluate MicroSim quality
Recognize the different types of validation steps
interactive_features: Click nodes to see detailed descriptions
Slider to adjust sample quality score
Toggle to switch between p5.js and non-p5.js types
Dynamic path highlighting based on inputs
